EmailTemplate.name: IHA Registration Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Initial application for In-Home Aide Certification submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
You have successfully submitted an application for certification as an In-Home Aide. {!CLQ_Program__c.CLQ_IHA_Name__c}. A copy of the application is attached to this email. You will be contacted by a county agency representative about the next steps in the process.
If you have additional questions please contact your county agency.
Sincerely, The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team.
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
